channel.title: Simulation – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Baby Taylor Back To School
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Baby Taylor Back To School is a casual education game. Today Taylor is going to school. Let’s help Taylor pack her things! Help Taylor review the knowledge she has learned so that her knowledge will be more solid.PCMouse click and drag to playMobileTap and slide to play
item.content:encoded:
Baby Taylor Back To School is a casual education game. Today Taylor is going to school. Let’s help Taylor pack her things! Help Taylor review the knowledge she has learned so that her knowledge will be more solid.
PCMouse click and drag to playMobileTap and slide to play

item.title: Mermaid Glitter Cake Maker
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mermaid Glitter Cake Maker is a fashion-cooking game. If you like making desserts and mermaids, then this game is tailor-made for you. You can experience making cupcakes, layer cakes, and birthday cakes respectively.On PC and mobileClick to play.
item.content:encoded:
Mermaid Glitter Cake Maker is a fashion-cooking game. If you like making desserts and mermaids, then this game is tailor-made for you. You can experience making cupcakes, layer cakes, and birthday cakes respectively.
On PC and mobileClick to play.

item.title: Fire Truck Driving Simulator
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Fire Truck Driving Simulator is a fire truck driving simulation game with 4 different modes.On PCWASD or Arrow keys = driveTap the right button = change to the water gunSwipe the screen with the mouse = switch the cameraOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen
item.content:encoded:
Fire Truck Driving Simulator is a fire truck driving simulation game with 4 different modes.
On PCWASD or Arrow keys = driveTap the right button = change to the water gunSwipe the screen with the mouse = switch the cameraOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen

item.title: My Newborn Baby Twins Care
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: My Newborn Baby Twins Care is a caring simulation game. As a caring and helpful child, are you willing to help Lucy take care of the cute twins? Help mommy to care for babies.On PC and mobileClick to play.
item.content:encoded:
My Newborn Baby Twins Care is a caring simulation game. As a caring and helpful child, are you willing to help Lucy take care of the cute twins? Help mommy to care for babies.
On PC and mobileClick to play.

item.title: Bike Stunt Racing Legend
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Bike Stunt Racing Legend is a balanced stunt simulation game. You are required to ride the motorbike to the finish line. Don’t be afraid of rolling ramps, pass the green arrows to speed up more easily. Keep calm and step on the gas!On PCW = forwardS = backA = liftD = pressR = flipOn MobileTap […]
item.content:encoded:
Bike Stunt Racing Legend is a balanced stunt simulation game. You are required to ride the motorbike to the finish line. Don’t be afraid of rolling ramps, pass the green arrows to speed up more easily. Keep calm and step on the gas!
On PCW = forwardS = backA = liftD = pressR = flipOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen

item.title: Little Panda Shark Family
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Little Panda Shark Family is a casual educational game. This game has 3 parts. This game has realistic sound effects and smooth animations. You will fall in love with this game.On PC and mobileClick to play.
item.content:encoded:
Little Panda Shark Family is a casual educational game. This game has 3 parts. This game has realistic sound effects and smooth animations. You will fall in love with this game.
On PC and mobileClick to play.

item.title: Real Flight Simulator
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Real Flight Simulator is a casual airplane driving game. You can learn how to drive an airplane including starting, steering, and landing. All of the complicated instrument panels are simplified for you to learn.On PCSlide up and down the right button = powerWASD = steer the directionsOn MobileDarg the green button = steerSlide the right […]
item.content:encoded:
Real Flight Simulator is a casual airplane driving game. You can learn how to drive an airplane including starting, steering, and landing. All of the complicated instrument panels are simplified for you to learn.
On PCSlide up and down the right button = powerWASD = steer the directionsOn MobileDarg the green button = steerSlide the right button = power

item.title: My Baby Unicorn 2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: My Baby Unicorn 2 is a fun caring game. You need to spend a wonderful day with your baby unicorn. Not only do we have to take care of her food and daily life, but we also have to help her dress up carefully.PCMouse click and drag to playMobileTap and slide to play
item.content:encoded:
My Baby Unicorn 2 is a fun caring game. You need to spend a wonderful day with your baby unicorn. Not only do we have to take care of her food and daily life, but we also have to help her dress up carefully.
PCMouse click and drag to playMobileTap and slide to play

item.title: Baby Panda Pet Care Center
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Baby Panda Pet Care Center is a casual education game. You will have the opportunity to rescue 2 cute animals with Baby Panda. You can not only enjoy the fun of playing but also learn basic rescue knowledge.On PC and mobileClick to play.
item.content:encoded:
Baby Panda Pet Care Center is a casual education game. You will have the opportunity to rescue 2 cute animals with Baby Panda. You can not only enjoy the fun of playing but also learn basic rescue knowledge.
On PC and mobileClick to play.

item.title: Last Day On Earth: Survival
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Last Day on Earth: Survival is a 2D survival simulation game. In this large ruined city, you have 51 locations to discover. When you collect some wood and metal, you can make weapons on the Workbench. When you win enough experience and level up, you can check your Attribute and upgrade HP, ATK, Speed, and […]
item.content:encoded:
Last Day on Earth: Survival is a 2D survival simulation game. In this large ruined city, you have 51 locations to discover. When you collect some wood and metal, you can make weapons on the Workbench. When you win enough experience and level up, you can check your Attribute and upgrade HP, ATK, Speed, and Search.
On PCWASD = moveOn MobileTap and drag = move
